properties.entry: SELECT [ALU_ID] AS ID,[ALN_NM_LOGIN] AS LOGIN,[ALN_NM_EMAIL] AS EMAIL,[ALN_CD_MATRICULA] AS MATRICULA FROM [biblioteca].[dbo].[ALN_ALUNO] WHERE ALN_CD_MATRICULA = ?
SELECT [ALU_ID] AS ID,[ALN_NM_LOGIN] AS LOGIN,[ALN_NM_EMAIL] AS EMAIL,[ALN_CD_MATRICULA] AS MATRICULA FROM [biblioteca].[dbo].[ALN_ALUNO] WHERE ALU_ID = ?
